decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings and documents: _X_00_200_0 EXISTING SECTION AA and BB, _P_00_101_01 REV A PROPOSED PLAN LOFT ANF ROOF, _P_00_300_01 REV A PROPOSED ELEVATIONS, _X_00_300_01 EXISTING ELEVATIONS, _P_00_100_01 PROPOSED PLAN GROUND AND FIRST FLOOR , _X_00_100_01 EXISTING PLAN AND LOCATION PLAN, _X_00_101_01 EXISTING PLAN LOFT AND ROOF, _P_00_200_01 REV A PROPOSED SECTION AA and BB.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

| The hereby approved ^IN; rooflights to the roof slope of the hereby development shall be Conservation style rooflights and lie flush with the roof and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason:  To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the conservation area in accordance with policies D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013). | The proposed ^IN; on the side elevations shall contain only obscure glass and only have top openings at a minimum of 1.7m from floor level.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties in accordance with policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), policies policy 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012). | Details of the replacement windows hereby approved shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority before their installation and this condition shall apply notwithstanding any indications as to these matters which have been given in this application. The details shall include 1:20 cross sectional drawings, materials, transoms, glazing, fixings and ironmongery. Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.

Reason: To ensure that the development harmonises with the character and appearance of the dwelling and would preserve the special character and appearance of the Conservation Area, in accordance with the Mill Hill Conservation Area Management Plan, policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Single storey rear/side extension, following demolition of existing rear/side addition; roof extension to rear (main) roofslope and installation of two roof lights to front roof slope; replacement of windows
